name: 梁斯寧　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: This course aims to enhance students' oral communication skills as critical thinkers and effective communicators in a variety of topics and contexts. Students are expected to actively participate in the class discussions and activities which are designed to develop their competence and confidence in English oral communication.
